Minor Admission Requirements

None
Prerequisite Courses
None

courseSection0.text0:
Complete the following: 
BSC2010C - Biology I (4)
MCB3020C - General Microbiology (5)
PCB3233L - Immunology Laboratory (1)
PCB3522 - Molecular Biology I (3)
PCB4524 - Molecular Biology II (3)
BSC3403C - Quantitative Biological Methods (4)
courseSection0.text1:
Complete at least 1 of the following: 
PCB3233 - Immunology (3)
PCB4280 - Molecular Immunology (3)

courseSection1.text0:
Earn at least 7 credits from the following types of courses: 
At least two courses from the Restricted Elective category of the baccalaureate curriculum.

li.A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all: A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
li.Grades less than \"C-\"(1.75) are not ac: Grades less than "C-"(1.75) are not accepted.
li.At least 15 hours used in the minor must: At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
li.Internship or Independent Study credit c: Internship or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection2.text:
Other Requirements

A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
Grades less than "C-"(1.75) are not accepted.
At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Internship or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
